means: 安排，准备( arrange的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They arranged to wire the money from the United States.
She smiled her thanks and arranged the guitar under her arm.
sentence.Network_cn: 她微笑着致了谢，把胳膊下面的吉他调整了一下。

sentence.Network_en: Variations of this programme can be arranged to suit your requirements.
sentence.Network_cn: 本方案可以进行调整，以满足您的需求。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Our marriage was arranged by my parents ., 我们的婚姻是我父母包办的.
hundred tables are arranged in five rows ., 一百张桌子排成五行.
英语高手帮下忙_百度知道 ... 8.put on 穿上 9.arranged 安排好 10.beating （心）跳.
arranged total loss=agreed total loss 议定全损arranged 安排的协商的arrangement diagram 布置图

list.abs: (A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... arouse vt. 引起，唤起；唤醒 arrange vt. 筹备；整理；调解 arrangement n. 整理，排列；安排.
大学英语精读单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... primary a. 首要的；最初的 arrange v. 作安排，筹划 minor a. 较小的；次要的.
安字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 安排〖 arrange;fixup〗 安排〖 arrangement;layout;format〗 安琪儿〖 angel〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... range n 山脉；范围 arrangement n 排列，布置 rearrange v 重新安排.

entry.tran: 安置于…的;建于…的;…布置的
entry.def: If you say how things are arranged, you are talking about their position in relation to each other or to something else.

example.ex: The house itself is three stories high and arranged around a courtyard...
example.tran: 房子本身有三层高，绕着一个庭院而建。

example.ex: They lived in neatly-arranged little houses.
example.tran: 他们住在布置整洁的小房子里。

means.word_mean: 1. disposed or placed in a particular kind of order;

auth_sentence.content: By early May, the deal had been arranged.
auth_sentence.res_content: By early May, the deal had been arranged.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By early May, the deal had been arranged.

auth_sentence.content: We finally arranged to meet on Memorial Day weekend.
auth_sentence.res_content: We finally arranged to meet on Memorial Day weekend.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We finally arranged to meet on Memorial Day weekend.

auth_sentence.content: It has twelve tubes arranged in three lines of four.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has twelve tubes arranged in three lines of four.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has twelve tubes arranged in three lines of four.

Sentence.sentence: In those where ties to family and community are strong, lifelong marriages can be promoted by practices such as the cultural prohibition of divorce and arranged marriages that are seen as a contract between two families, not just two individuals.
Interracial lodging is arranged by the school for freshmen.
